comprehensive_overview: The Intel C++ Compiler (Intel CCL) is a high-performance optimizing compiler for C and C++ programming languages. It is designed to produce highly optimized code for Intel processors, including Intel Xeon Scalable processors and Intel Xeon Phi processors. Intel CCL supports the latest C++ language standards and provides advanced vectorization and parallelization capabilities.
core_features: High-performance optimizing compiler for C and C++
Support for latest C++ language standards
